General.Name: Kadimastem Ltd
General.Description: Kadimastem Ltd, a biopharmaceutical company, develops regenerative medicine therapies based on cells derived from human embryonic stem cells to treat neuro-degenerative diseases. Its products in pipeline include AstroRx, a clinical grade human astrocytes that is in Phase 1/2a clinical trial for the treatment of amyotrophic lateral sclerosis and other neurodegenerative diseases; and IsletRx, a clinical grade pancreatic islet cell therapy treatment for diabetes. The company was incorporated in 2008 and is based in Ness Ziona, Israel.

2.Name: Dr. Michal Harel Izrael
2.Title: VP of R&D for ALS and Neurodegenerative Diseases

3.Name: Prof. Michel  Revel M.D., Ph.D.
3.Title: Co-Founder, Chief Scientist, Head of the Scientific Advisory Board & Director
